Your task is to write a brief, fluent, and coherent single-paragraph product description in natural language. The text should be balanced and neutral. Make sure that all the facts mentioned in the text can be derived from the input data, do *not* add any extra information.
generated.out: Introducing the iQOO 12 Pro, a high-performance smartphone powered by the Qualcomm SM8650-AB Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. The device features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 144Hz refresh rate, 1600 nits brightness, and HDR10+ support. It comes with up to 1TB of internal storage and 16GB of RAM, and supports expandable storage via microSD card. The triple rear camera setup includes a 50MP primary sensor, a 64MP periscope telephoto sensor, and a 50MP ultra-wide sensor, while the front-facing camera is a 16MP sensor. The device supports 8K video recording, 4K video recording at 24/30/60fps, and 1080p video recording at 30/60/120/240fps, along with gyro-EIS for stabilized video recording. The iQOO 12 Pro also features a 5100mAh battery that supports 120W wired charging and 50W wireless charging, and runs on Android 14 with Funtouch 14 (International) or OriginOS 4 (China) operating system. The device is available in Black, Red, and White colors and is priced around 650 EUR.

generated.out: The Emporia Elegance is a discontinued mobile phone that was released in 2012. It has a 1.8-inch display with a resolution of 128 x 160 pixels, which translates to approximately 114 pixels per inch. The phone does not have a camera, but it does have a flashlight. It runs on the Infineon PMB7880 chipset and has 2MB of RAM. The phone does not have a SIM card slot, but it can store up to 100 phonebook entries and up to 4 hours of talk time. The battery is a Li-Ion 1100mAh, removable battery. The phone is available in black, white, and brown colors.

generated.out: The XOLO Era is a smartphone that was released in 2015. It has a 5.0-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 480 x 854 pixels. The device runs on Android 4.4.2 (KitKat) and is powered by a Spreadtrum 7731 chipset with a Quad-core 1.2 GHz CPU and a Mali-400 GPU. The smartphone comes with 8GB of internal storage and 1GB of RAM, and it supports microSDHC card slots. The main camera on the XOLO Era is an 8-megapixel sensor with LED flash, panorama, and HDR features, while the selfie camera is a 2-megapixel sensor. The device also features Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, NFC, FM radio, and microUSB 2.0 for connectivity. The XOLO Era is available in black and costs around 60 EUR.
